docs.snippet: In a story Feb. 9 about a recall of Ruth's Salads pimento cheese spread, The Associated Press reported erroneously where some of the recalled items were made. All of the recalled spread was made in a plant in Chester, South Carolina; none of it wa...
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story Feb. 9 about a recall of Ruth's Salads pimento cheese spread, The Associated Press reported erroneously where some of the recalled items were made. All of the recalled spread was made in a plant in Chester, South Carolina; none of it was made in Charlotte, North Carolina.

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump’s “wall” along the U.S.-Mexico border would be a series of fences and walls that would cost as much as $21.6 billion, and take more than three years to construct, based on a U.S. Department of Homeland Secu...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump’s “wall” along the U.S.-Mexico border would be a series of fences and walls that would cost as much as $21.6 billion, and take more than three years to construct, based on a U.S. Department of Homeland Security internal report seen by Reuters on Thursday.

headline.main: Exclusive-Trump Border 'Wall' to Cost $21.6 Billion, Take 3.5 Years to Build: Internal Report
headline.print_headline: Exclusive-Trump Border 'Wall' to Cost $21.6 Billion, Take 3.5 Years to Build: Internal Report

docs.snippet: A U.S. Navy P-3 plane and a Chinese military aircraft came close to each other over the South China Sea in an incident the Navy believes was inadvertent, a U.S. official told Reuters on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A U.S. Navy P-3 plane and a Chinese military aircraft came close to each other over the South China Sea in an incident the Navy believes was inadvertent, a U.S. official told Reuters on Thursday.

headline.main: U.S., China Military Planes Come Inadvertently Close Over South China Sea
headline.print_headline: U.S., China Military Planes Come Inadvertently Close Over South China Sea
